item.title: Need help with ::pickup [delta]
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

Here use this one

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)&& (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 6122 && newItemID != 4508 && newItemID != 7141 && newItemID != 6384 && newItemID != 6385 && newItemID != 6577 && newItemID != 6578 && newItemID != 732 && newItemID != 430 && newItemID != 6570 && newItemID != 2904 && newItemID != 2402 && newItemID != 8002 && newItemID != 6818 && newItemID != 4508 && newItemID != 6385 && newItemID != 6577 && newItemID != 667 && newItemID != 1077 && newItemID != 746 && newItemID != 1107 && newItemID != 1037 && newItemID != 1038 && newItemID != 1039 && newItemID != 1040 && newItemID != 1041 && newItemID != 1042 && newItemID != 1043 && newItemID != 1044 && newItemID != 1045 && newItemID != 1046 && newItemID != 1048 && newItemID != 1049 && newItemID != 1050 && newItemID != 1051 && newItemID != 1052 && newItemID != 1053 && newItemID != 1054 && newItemID != 1055 && newItemID != 1056 && newItemID != 1057 && newItemID != 1058 && newItemID != 1047 && newItemID != 7142) {
if (newItemID <= 1000000 && newItemID >= 0) {
if(pvpmode || isclangame) {
sM(“Idiot get out of PVP to spawn!.”);
} else {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}
} else {
sM(“Bitch only Bandos Can spawn this!!”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 995 1.”);
}
}
}[/code]
this is for what item’s u cant spawn so u can delet the number’s or add more if u like or yeh if(newItemID != 6122 && newItemID != 4508 && newItemID != 7141 && newItemID != 6384 && newItemID != 6385 && newItemID != 6577 && newItemID != 6578 && newItemID != 732 && newItemID != 430 && newItemID != 6570 && newItemID != 2904 && newItemID != 2402 && newItemID != 8002 && newItemID != 6818 && newItemID != 4508 && newItemID != 6385 && newItemID != 6577 && newItemID != 667 && newItemID != 1077 && newItemID != 746 && newItemID != 1107 && newItemID != 1037 && newItemID != 1038 && newItemID != 1039 && newItemID != 1040 && newItemID != 1041 && newItemID != 1042 && newItemID != 1043 && newItemID != 1044 && newItemID != 1045 && newItemID != 1046 && newItemID != 1048 && newItemID != 1049 && newItemID != 1050 && newItemID != 1051 && newItemID != 1052 && newItemID != 1053 && newItemID != 1054 && newItemID != 1055 && newItemID != 1056 && newItemID != 1057 && newItemID != 1058 && newItemID != 1047 && newItemID != 7142) { that part
